content: into next gap skipping the underarm gaps where we tied the knot indicated by the arrows 3dc each gap around skipping the underarm knot gaps on each side for each arm slip_stitch to close round 48 or 16 clusters row 6 slip_stitch into any gap except the ones indicated by the arrows below chain 3 2dc in same gap 3dc in each gap around except the ones indicated by the arrow below skip these gaps on the front and back for both arms slip_stitch into top of first stitch to close round 12 clusters row 7 slip_stitch into top of any double_crochet post chain 3 double_crochet in each stitch around slip_stitch to close 36 pattern and images are original works of holly lively pattern may not be redistributed for free or for profit in audio written or video form you are welcome to sell the products you make using this pattern
